meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Trachtenberg Terrie Vasilopoulos Mary Ann Borer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7869.

td.p: David Trachtenberg, a science teacher from Sherman Oaks, California
Terrie Vasilopoulos, an assistant professor from Gainesville, Florida
Mary Ann Borer, a marketing coordinator from Pomona, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $67,800)

tr.td: THE NOBEL MUSEUM
ON THE 2018 BILLBOARD CHARTS
GIVE A LITTLE WHISTLE
UN-BUSINESS
AGATHA CHRISTIE BOOK TITLES
VWLLSS HWN
(Alex: Vowelless Hawaiian.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents from the Nobel Museum in Stockholm, Sweden.) At the Bistro Nobel, you can enjoy the same ice cream served at the awards banquet & sit on a chair signed by a Nobel Prize winner--for instance, this 2009 Peace Prize winner')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents from the Nobel Museum in Stockholm, Sweden.) At the Bistro Nobel, you can enjoy the same ice cream served at the awards banquet & sit on a chair signed by a Nobel Prize winner--for instance, this 2009 Peace Prize winner

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Mary Ann
Terrie
David
'99 PROBLEMS
THE OLD TESTAMENT
PIONEERING TELEVISION
SOCIAL SCIENCE
DAMS
ALL ENCOMPASSING WORDS
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that can be made up of the letters you find in the word "encompassing".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
